casebody.data:
No. 09-9266. Christopher A. Odom, Petitioner v. Mt. Pleasant Municipal Court, South Carolina. 559 U.S. 1090, 130 S. Ct. 2379,

176 L. Ed. 2d 764,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3627. April 26, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Same case below, 358 Fed. Appx. 486.
